snippet.title: Big Fat Battle - Extended Next Fest Trailer
snippet.description:
Big Fat Battle is a fast-paced, knockout, arena shooter with roguelike mid-round mechanics and Mario Kart style powerups.  We'll be showcasing a demo at Next Fest on Steam in June and releasing shortly after into Early Access.

Enjoy the extended trailer!


Wishlist on Steam - https://bit.ly/bfb_yttr


Join our Discord - http://bit.ly/3Tx7xqF
